title: Reddit
cleaned_text: [r/medicine](/r/medicine/) r/medicine is a virtual lounge for physicians and other medical professionals from around the world to talk about the latest advances, controversies, ask questions of each other, have a laugh, or share a difficult moment. This is a highly moderated subreddit. Please read the rules carefully before posting or commenting. Currently a 2nd year med student. Just wanted to know if there's conflict between traditional and alternative medicine practitioners within households as I sometimes have debates with my parents about ayurveda and homeopathy (albeit they don't practice alt medicine).
